mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "The 34th National", "TV and Stage", "Basics Tell a Story", "Premiums of '85", "Bookshelf", "Join the Sweepstakes", "The Greatest Calling Source Book" and "Foot Health." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Style Lab", "Contra Corner", "Ladies on the Square", "Experimental Notes", "Advanced Dancing", "Mostly Modular", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month, " On the Record" and "Current Releases."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
